2 import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
3 import csv
4 import numpy as np
5 from requests import patch
6 file = open("loc_scan.csv")
7 x1 = []
8 y1 = []
9 z1 = []
10 r1 = []
11 csvreader = csv.reader(file, delimiter=',')
12 for row in csvreader:
13  x1.append(float(row[0]))
14  y1.append(float(row[1]))
15  z1.append(float(row[2]))
16  r1.append(float(row[3])*2)
17 file.close()

32 fontsize=20
33 plt.rcParams.update({'font.size': fontsize, 'axes.titlesize':fontsize})
34 plt.rc('font', size=fontsize) # controls default text sizes
35 plt.rc('axes', titlesize=fontsize) # fontsize of the axes title
36 plt.rc('axes', labelsize=fontsize) # fontsize of the x and y labels
37 plt.rc('xtick', labelsize=fontsize) # fontsize of the tick labels

61 def getyticks(middle):
62  return [ middle-0.05, middle, middle +0.05]

91 file = open("loc_validate.csv")
92 x_val=[]
93 y_val=[]
94 csvreader = csv.reader(file, delimiter=',')

96  """ x_val.append(float(row[0]))

98  circle1 = plt.Circle((float(row[0]),float(row[1])),float(row[3]), color="orange", fill=False)
